attributes.comment:
Hello. I'm not against a raise in the fees to file in itself. However, I do not like the
fact that because we are adopting from China and due to the lengthy wait to
receive our child match, that I will have to refile the I-600A. I think it would be OK
to raise the overall fee, but I don't think that should be done unless the timeframe
until expiration is extended to a timeframe that takes into consideration the
extended period of time to adopt from China, OR the fee to refile is significantly
reduced. I have a hard time understanding why it costs the exact same amount to
refile the same information, anyway.

Thanks,
Amy N Klopfenstein
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Amy N. Klopfenstein
